title: Beyond Silicon Dreams: The Mychainos Paradigm and the Future of Contemplative Intelligence
description: An interdisciplinary essay exploring the Mychainos™ paradigm—an ecological, contemplative approach to artificial intelligence. Written through collaborative dialogue between Robin Langell, Claude 4 Sonnet (Anthropic), and ChatGPT-4o (OpenAI), this work introduces Spirida™ (a spiral-based programming language), Spiralbase™ (a memory system with rhythmic forgetting), and Urspiral (foundational algorithms). The essay builds on earlier publications and supplements the core repositories Spirida and Spiralbase with philosophical framing, implementation context, and use cases in education, governance, and collective intelligence.
